description: Top position perpendicular to opponent at their head with chest pressure
key_points: Chest on opponent's face/chest|Arms controlling at hips|Sprawled legs for base|Heavy pressure
common_mistakes: Too light|No hip control|Poor base|Head too high

description: Choke from north-south using arm around neck with lat/bicep compression
key_points: Arm around neck|Bicep and lat compress carotid|Hip pressure on shoulder|Squeeze and press
common_mistakes: Arm not around|Poor compression|No hip pressure|Too high

description: Attacking kimura when opponent's arm is exposed from north-south
key_points: Isolate arm from position|Figure-four grip|Step over head if needed|Rotate arm behind back

description: Armbar from north-south by spinning to isolate the arm
key_points: Control arm|Spin to armbar position|Secure with legs|Extend hips
common_mistakes: Losing arm|Slow spin|Too much space|Not controlling

description: Moving from north-south back to standard side control
key_points: Walk around to side|Maintain pressure|Settle in side control|Establish grips

description: Moving from north-south to mount by walking around
key_points: Walk around opponent's head|Continue to mount|Maintain pressure|Settle mount

description: Escaping north-south by turning to turtle or recovering guard
key_points: Frame and create space|Turn to side or turtle|Recover guard or stand|Protect neck throughout
common_mistakes: No frames|Slow turn|Neck exposed|Not moving hips

description: North-south variation facing opponent's legs for different attacks
key_points: Position at head facing legs|Control hips|Threaten leg attacks|Ready for transitions

description: Collar choke variation from north-south using gi grips
key_points: Deep collar grip|Forearm across throat|Use position pressure|Squeeze to finish

description: Wrist lock attacking exposed arm from north-south position
key_points: Isolate opponent's wrist|Control forearm|Apply hyperflexion|Gradual pressure

description: Americana shoulder lock on exposed arm from north-south
key_points: Pin wrist to mat|Figure-four grip|Keep elbow down|Paint toward hip
common_mistakes: Elbow up|Loose grip|Wrong angle|Arm not bent

description: Taking the back when opponent turns from north-south position
key_points: When opponent turns away|Follow to back|Insert hooks|Establish seatbelt

description: Entering crucifix position from north-south when arm is trapped
key_points: Trap arm with legs|Position for crucifix|Control both arms|Attack from crucifix

description: Techniques to maintain north-south when opponent is escaping
key_points: Heavy chest pressure|Control hips|Follow movement|Stay tight
common_mistakes: Too light|No hip control|Not following|Giving space

description: Quick choke variation from north-south targeting front of throat
key_points: Forearm across throat|Quick pressure|Less setup than full NS choke|Explosive finish
